spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Wrap
spec_data.Description:
This is a Pod::Parser subclass, based on Pod::Stripper. It parses perl
files, wrapping pod text, and leaving everything else intact. It prints
it's output to wherever you point it to (like you do with Pod::Parser (and
Pod::Stripper)).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:24:01 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Wrap pod paragraphs, leaving verbatim text and code alone
